title: Client Success Manager
description:
Full-Time | Remote | $1,800–$2,300 Base + Performance Bonuses



We’re hiring a proactive, highly organised Client Success Manager to oversee client experience, community engagement, CRM control, and deal coordination across three growing businesses.



This role is ideal for someone who is:

- Friendly and confident with clients

- Extremely organised

- Calm under pressure

- Commercially aware

- Comfortable managing multiple moving parts



You’ll be responsible for making sure clients feel supported, systems stay clean, and deals keep progressing.



This is a long-term opportunity with real growth potential into a senior operations role.



What You’ll Be Responsible For

1) Community Management & Growth

- Manage and engage a private client community

- Encourage discussion and participation

- Share weekly performance reports

- Position relevant products/services naturally when appropriate

- Maintain a strong retention culture



You will play a direct role in community-driven revenue growth.



2) Lead Generation Client Success (15 Active Clients)

- Onboard new clients smoothly

- Ensure expectations are clear

- Confirm leads are being handled properly

- Keep client CRMs organised and updated

- Ensure clients have scripts and materials needed

- Act as the main bridge between clients and internal team



We also have 100+ light clients, but these require minimal management.



3) Deal & Operations Coordination (M&A + Internal CRM)

- Manage deal-related
s

- Route communication to the correct person

- Follow up to ensure actions are completed

- Keep internal CRM accurate and organised

- Ensure required documents are prepared for signings

- Help keep acquisition deals moving by coordinating between lawyers, accountants, sellers and buyers



Deals vary in complexity, so attention to detail and consistency are critical.



Salary & Bonus Structure

Base Salary



$1,800 – $2,300 per month (Full-Time, 40 Hours/Week)

Higher offers possible for exceptional candidates.



Performance Bonuses



You will have the opportunity to earn additional monthly and quarterly bonuses:



Community Upsell Bonus

2–5% of revenue generated from community-driven upgrades

or fixed bonus per conversion



Client Retention Bonus

Quarterly bonus if retention targets are maintained (90%+)



Lead Response Speed Bonus

Monthly bonus if response time KPIs are met (95%+ within agreed SLA)



M&A Deal Milestone Bonus

Bonus paid per completed deal or key deal milestones reached



Total compensation potential: $2,700–$3,400+ per month for strong performance.



Requirements:

- Excellent written English

- Strong organisational skills

- CRM experience (GoHighLevel, HubSpot or similar)

- Experience in client success, operations, or account management

- Comfortable communicating with business owners

- Able to manage 40 hours per week



Bonus if you have:

- Lead generation agency experience

- Community management experience

- Exposure to M&A or deal environments



How To Apply

Please send:

1. A 2–3 minute video explaining:

- Your client success or operations experience

- How you stay organised across multiple workflows

- Why you believe you’re a strong fit for this role

2. Your CV

Subject line: Client Success Manager Application



We’re looking for someone who enjoys helping clients succeed, keeping systems organised, and playing a key role in business growth.



If that sounds like you, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Reddit Assistant
description:
We’re hiring people to manage daily activity on Reddit, including posting content and interacting within communities. This is ongoing work and requires someone who actually understands how Reddit functions, not just how to scroll it.



You’ll need atleast 3+ devices (Android only). If you own multiple devices, that’s a plus and allows you to earn more. Expect roughly one hour of work per device each day.



Each day you’ll post content across several subreddits.



A critical part of this role is reading the room. The videos we provide can range from humorous to emotional to awkward or uncomfortable. You need to instantly recognize the tone and write posts that feel natural for that type of content. If you post everything the same way, you’ll fail.



You’ll also be responsible for finding appropriate subreddits for each video. That means reviewing community rules, understanding what performs well there, and making sure your post doesn’t look forced or out of place. If you can’t do that consistently, this position isn’t for you.



We’re looking for people who think independently, adapt fast, and don’t need their hand held. Prior Reddit experience is helpful but not mandatory if you learn quickly.



This is a long-term opportunity for dependable workers. Compensation is solid and can increase based on results and how many devices you use.



Earnings:

Most contributors earn $100–$500 per month, depending on consistency and the number of devices used.



Time Commitment:

Daily time commitment ranges from about 1 to 5 hours, depending on how many devices you’re using



To apply, include:

• how many devices you can work with

• your experience using Reddit

• when you’re available each day

title: Customer Experience Virtual Assistant (Phone Based)
description:
Note: Interested applicants must submit their application exclusively through the OnlineJobs platform. Do not
 the company directly. Any candidate who contacts the company outside of the OnlineJobs system will be disqualified from consideration.



Customer Experience Virtual Assistant (Phone-Based, Process-Driven)



Job Overview



Are you someone who takes pride in handling customer interactions the right way—calmly, professionally, and consistently? Do you do well with clear expectations, scripts, and processes, and enjoy improving quickly through feedback? If so, Maid In America Cleaning Services, based in Clarksville, TN, wants to hear from you.



We’re seeking a Customer Experience Virtual Assistant to serve as a frontline point of contact for our customers and a dependable executor of structured processes. Working closely with our sales and customer experience teams, you’ll be responsible for answering inbound calls, handling customer requests, following defined scripts, and routing issues accurately.



This role is process-driven and phone-heavy, especially during training. The work can be fast-paced at times, but it is highly structured. Your ability to stay calm, follow instructions precisely, and take coaching seriously will have a direct impact on customer satisfaction and team efficiency.



What You’ll Do



- Answer & Handle Inbound Customer Calls: Be the first point of contact for customers and new inquiries, answering calls promptly, professionally, and calmly while following provided phone scripts.

- Follow Scripts & Decision Trees: Handle common customer needs—such as scheduling questions, reschedules, basic service inquiries, and initial issue intake—by following clear scripts and escalation rules exactly.

- Route Requests Accurately: Determine when a request can be handled directly and when it should be escalated to the appropriate tea
mber, ensuring clean handoffs and no dropped balls.

- Create a Positive Customer Experience: Make customers feel heard, cared for, and confident that their request is being handled, even when issues or complaints arise.

- Document Interactions & Updates: Log accurate notes and updates in our systems so the internal team always has clear context and next steps.

- Support Structured Administrative Workflows: Execute defined backend processes (task tracking, updates, file movement, and follow-through) by following SOPs and checklists without skipping steps.

- Receive Coaching & Improve Quickly: Actively apply feedback on calls, scripts, and workflows, improving speed, accuracy, and confidence over time.



Who We’re Looking For



- Process-Driven & Detail-Oriented: You’re comfortable following scripts, checklists, and SOPs exactly, and you don’t skip steps or “freestyle” your work.

- Calm & Professional on the Phone: You communicate clearly and confidently, stay composed with customers, and can handle questions or mild frustration without getting flustered.

- Highly Coachable: You take feedback seriously, apply it quickly, and improve fast—especially when it comes to phone scripts and customer handling.

- Reliable & Consistent: You show up on time, follow through on tasks, and can be counted on to do things the right way every time.

- Comfortable with Structure: You prefer clear expectations, defined processes, and knowing exactly what “good” looks like in your role.

- Tech-Comfortable: You’re comfortable working inside tools like Slack, shared documents, and task systems—or you can learn them quickly with instructions.

- Strong Communicator: Whether by phone, chat, or written notes, you communicate clearly, professionally, and respectfully.



Our Core Values



- Communication

- Connection

- Quality

- Service

- Teamwork



If you share these values, we want you on our team to help drive our company forward.



Important Note: Screening Step



SERIOUS APPLICANTS ONLY:

Complete our personality test to see if there’s a mutual fit:


/p/fzxN5FC9302s 

Give honest answers; there are no right or wrong results.



Submit your application with the subject line beginning with the core value we’ve listed that you most resonate with.



IMPORTANT: When applying, please use AT LEAST 5 Apply Points



Skills & Requirements

- Fluent English: Strong spoken and written English is required. This is a phone-based role, and customers must be able to understand you clearly and comfortably.

- Customer Service Experience: Prior experience handling customer inquiries or support requests over the phone is required.

- Process & Administrative Competence: You’re comfortable following multi-step processes, documenting information accurately, and keeping systems up to date.

- Attention to Detail: You consistently capture the right information, follow instructions precisely, and avoid careless errors.

- Coachability: You’re open to feedback, willing to be corrected, and able to apply coaching quickly—especially when learning phone scripts and customer-handling expectations.

- Technical Readiness:

  - Reliable computer with backup power options

  - Quality headset and microphone

  - Quiet workspace suitable for phone calls

- Ability to Work Monday-Friday, 8AM-5PM CST.

- Reliable Internet & Backup Options: Stable internet connection with a backup plan to ensure consistent availability and responsiveness.



Why Join Maid In America Cleaning Services?



- Impactful Role: Your quick execution and initiative will directly affect customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.

- Growth-Oriented Culture: We embrace new ideas, reward proactive thinking, and train daily for continual improvement.

title: Recruiting Operations Specialist (Full-Cycle Hiring + Onboarding) GHL experience required
description:
Recruiting Operations Specialist



(Full-Cycle Hiring + Onboarding + Client Call Booking)

TimeProof Required | GoHighLevel + ATS | Weekly Leadership Meetings | SOP Builder



We are a U.S.-based commercial services company building a structured, accountable, and scalable hiring operation across multiple territories.



We are hiring a Recruiting Operations Specialist who has built recruiting and onboarding functions from the ground up — not someone who simply follows tasks.



This role requires a recruitment operator who has led full-cycle hiring, managed compliance, partnered with leadership, and enforced structured onboarding standards.



This is not a task-based VA role.

This is a high-ownership HR operations role.



We are looking for someone who:

	•	Has led end-to-end hiring across departments or territories

	•	Takes full ownership of recruiting pipelines

	•	Identifies gaps before they become operational failures

	•	Improves processes without being prompted

	•	Holds candidates and systems to audit-ready standards

	•	Understands compliance, documentation discipline, and reporting



You are responsible for outcomes, readiness, and structure — not just activity.





What You Will Own



1) Full-Cycle Recruiting (End-to-End Ownership)



You will manage the complete hiring lifecycle:

	•	Workforce planning alignment with leadership

	•	Posting and managing job ads across platforms

	•	Proactive sourcing and social recruiting

	•	Resume review and structured candidate evaluation

	•	Conducting professional interviews with documented notes

	•	Managing offers, pre-onboarding steps, and readiness tracking

	•	Maintaining structured pipeline flow inside GoHighLevel + ATS



We expect strategic recruiting — not reactive hiring.





2) Onboarding & Workforce Readiness



You will ensure every hire is operationally ready before activation:

	•	Lead onboarding start to finish

	•	Clearly communicate expectations, performance standards, and policies

	•	Track completion of training and documentation

	•	Maintain audit-ready digital employee files

	•	Prevent underqualified or incomplete hires from reaching clients



You enforce readiness standards and compliance discipline.





3) Compliance, Documentation & HR Oversight



This role requires structured HR operations experience:

	•	Collect and verify W-9/W-4, IDs, certifications, licenses

	•	Maintain organized, audit-ready records

	•	Ensure no documentation gaps

	•	Support reporting for leadership

	•	Uphold policy enforcement and documentation accuracy



If documentation is incomplete, it is not approved.





4) Client Outreach + Call Booking (Required)



In addition to recruiting, you will support revenue operations by:

	•	Making outbound calls to business decision-makers

	•	Booking qualified staffing calls for leadership

	•	Confirming hiring needs, schedules, and role requirements

	•	Logging all communication inside the CRM



You coordinate and structure the process.

Leadership handles final pricing and closing.





5) SOP Creation + Process Infrastructure



We are building infrastructure — not chaos.



You will:

	•	Create and refine recruiting and onboarding SOPs

	•	Build checklists, workflows, and documentation systems

	•	Improve inefficiencies in hiring processes

	•	Develop reporting structures and operational dashboards

	•	Strengthen accountability across the pipeline



If you see operational friction, you fix it.





6) Systems & Operational Reporting



You will manage:

	•	GoHighLevel pipelines, tags, workflows, notes, and tasks

	•	ATS accuracy and candidate movement tracking

	•	Weekly structured reporting to leadership

	•	Compliance dashboards and hiring metrics



This is a systems-driven role requiring operational clarity.





Required Experience



We are specifically seeking candidates who have:

	•	Built or led recruiting functions from scratch

	•	Managed multi-territory or multi-department hiring

	•	Served as HR Head, Recruitment Lead, or similar

	•	Overseen compliance and HR documentation

	•	Worked directly with department heads or leadership

	•	Managed structured onboarding programs



This is not entry-level recruiting.





Systems Experience (Required)



Hands-on experience with:

	•	GoHighLevel (pipelines, workflows, forms, automation)

	•	ATS / Recruiting CRM (CEIPAL, Bullhorn, Zoho Recruit, JobAdder, etc.)

	•	HRMS platforms

	•	Google Workspace

	•	Microsoft Office





Required Skills (Non-Negotiable)

	•	Full-cycle recruiting leadership experience

	•	Strong structured interviewing and candidate evaluation

	•	Onboarding program management

	•	Compliance and documentation discipline

	•	Confident phone communication (candidate + client calls)

	•	Process design and SOP development

	•	Organized, detail-oriented, execution-focused

	•	Fluent spoken and written English



You must be confident making decisions and being accountable for results.





Meetings + Tracking (Non-Negotiable)

	•	Weekly leadership meetings

	•	Full-time (40 hours/week)

	•	Daily responsiveness during EST hours

	•	TimeProof tracking required



This role requires visibility, reporting discipline, and accountability.





Required to Apply (Must Submit All Three)



Applications missing any of these will not be reviewed.



1) Video Introduction (2–4 minutes)



Cover:

	•	Recruiting leadership background

	•	Hiring volume managed

	•	Onboarding systems built

	•	Compliance/documentation structure

	•	Client call booking experience

	•	GHL + ATS systems experience

	•	An example of building or improving a recruiting process



2) Resume



Must show leadership-level recruiting experience, hiring scope, industries, and measurable outcomes.



3) Systems List



List all tools used (ATS, CRM, HRMS, automation tools, reporting systems).





Compensation



Base: $800/month (paid weekly, milestone-based)



Performance bonuses tied to:

	•	Pipeline health

	•	Placement readiness

	•	Call booking performance

	•	Documentation compliance

	•	System accuracy





This is a long-term operations role for someone who wants to build recruiting infrastructure, not simply execute tasks.

title: Appointment Setting & Pipeline Manager
description:
We are a marketing company that helps service-based businesses generate leads and book appointments through paid advertising.

We are hiring a part-time Virtual Assistant (20–25 hours per week) to manage lead follow-up, appointment setting, deposit collection, pipeline organization, and reporting.

This is NOT a beginner VA role.

This is a performance-focused, client-facing position for someone organized, confident on the phone, and comfortable working inside GoHighLevel.



Compensation

Part-time: 20–25 hours per week



Starting pay: $5–$7 per hour (based on experience)



Performance bonuses available for strong results



We are looking for someone long-term who wants stability and growth.



Core Responsibilities

???? Lead Follow-Up & Appointment Setting

Call and text new leads within 5 minutes



Follow approved scripts (no pricing or closing)



Book qualified appointments directly on the calendar



Send confirmations and reminders



Follow up with no-shows



Primary goal: Keep calendars full with qualified appointments.



???? Deposit Collection

Send deposit links to qualified prospects



Clearly explain deposit instructions



Confirm payment is received



Move paid prospects to the correct pipeline stage

You are not closing the deal.

You are securing the appointment and deposit when required.



???? Pipeline & CRM Management (GoHighLevel)

Manage and update pipelines daily



Move leads through stages accurately



Tag and label contacts properly



Log all calls, texts, and actions in contact notes



Ensure no lead falls through the cracks



Clean CRM = smooth operations.



???? Reporting & Admin

Track leads, booked calls, deposits collected, shows, and no-shows



Submit weekly performance reports



Update tracking sheets daily



Requirements

Strong spoken and written English



Confident and comfortable on phone calls



Experience with GoHighLevel (or similar CRM)



Highly organized and detail-oriented



Able to follow systems and scripts exactly



Reliable and responsive



What Success Looks Like

Leads are contacted quickly



Appointments are consistently booked



Deposits are collected properly



Pipelines are always accurate



Reports are submitted on time



No operational bottlenecks



???? Required Intro Task (Read Carefully)

If you do not complete this exactly as instructed, your application will not be reviewed.

We are testing communication skills and systems thinking.



1?? 2-Minute Video (Loom or similar)

Record a 2-minute video answering:

Your experience with appointment setting



Your experience with GoHighLevel (or similar CRM)



Why you are confident speaking on the phone



No video = no review.



2?? Lead Handling Scenario (Written)

Scenario:



A new lead submits a form at 3:00 PM.

You call at 3:04 PM — no answer.



Write:

The text you send immediately after the missed call



What you would say if they answer on the second call



How you would move this lead inside the pipeline



Goal: Book the appointment and move the lead correctly.

Do NOT mention pricing or closing.



At the top of your application, write this exact phrase:



“Pipelines stay clean.”



If that sentence is missing, your application will not be reviewed.

title: Content Strategist + Designer + Editor
description:
Remote | Part-Time to Start | Long-Term Growth Opportunity



Sandra Sharpe Wellness is a premium functional fertility and hormone health brand supporting ambitious 30+ women and couples navigating infertility, IVF, miscarriage, and hormone challenges.



We are known for:

 • Root-cause education

 • Clinical depth

 • Emotional intelligence

 • High-touch client support

 • Premium positioning



We are scaling and looking for a Content Strategist + Designer who can help us elevate our content into a category-leading presence in the fertility space, especially in the Middle East.



The Role



This is not just a designer role. You will work directly with Sandra to:

 • Plan monthly content strategy

 • Organize messaging themes 

 • Design high-converting carousels

 • Edit high-quality reels

 • Create branded graphics

 • Help manage content calendar

 • Turn ideas into polished, strategic assets



You will help position us as the authority in functional fertility.





Responsibilities



Strategy & Planning

 • Monthly content mapping

 • Text animations

 • Story graphics



Copy & Messaging

Organization

Who You Are

title: Sales Development Representative (SDR) – High-Volume Cold Calling (B2G)
description:
Remote / Work From Home | Company based in California



About Us

Bi-Rite Global is a certified small business and a trusted retailer that supplies a wide range of products to government agencies — including federal, state, and education sectors. Based in California, we are rapidly expanding and focused on delivering quality products, competitive pricing, and reliable service to our government partners.



Role Summary

We are looking for a Sales Development Representative (SDR) – High-Volume Cold Calling (B2G) that is responsible for initiating outbound calls to federal, state, and local government agencies to identify contracting opportunities, introduce company services, and qualify decision-makers involved in procurement. The role supports the business development pipeline by generating leads, setting capability briefings, and gathering intelligence on upcoming bids and purchasing needs.



Key Responsibilities

• Conduct high-volume outbound calls to government offices and departments

• Identify contracting officers, procurement specialists, and program managers

• Introduce company capabilities and differentiate services

• Qualify opportunities based on agency needs, budgets, and timelines

• Schedule capability briefings or discovery meetings for sales/business development teams

• Gather information on upcoming solicitations, RFPs, and purchasing cycles

• Maintain accurate CRM records and call notes

• Follow up via
 and phone to nurture relationships

• Track targets such as contacts reached, meetings set, and opportunities generated



Qualifications 

• Professional phone presence and clear communication skills

• Persistent and comfortable with high-volume outbound calling and rejection

• Strong research skills to identify government decision-makers

• Organized with accurate CRM documentation and time management

• Understanding of B2G (Business to Government) sales or ability to learn quickly

• Experience in lead generation, appointment setting, telemarketing, or inside sales

• Exposure to government procurement or public-sector contracting preferred

• Familiarity with RFP/RFQ processes, vendor registrations, and contract vehicles is an advantage

• Able to clearly present company capabilities and services



Work Environment

• 100% Remote (must have reliable work-from-home setup)

• Structured schedule aligned with business hours of government agencies

• Use of approved scripts and compliance-focused communication

• Calls primarily to public offices, vendors, or registered partners

• Performance tracked by call quality, accuracy, and documentation — not aggressive contracting

• Collaboration with compliance, procurement, and contracts teams

• Strict adherence to data privacy, confidentiality, and record-keeping standards

• Professional and formal communication style required

• Write "I want this job" on the
 subject line.



Technical Requirements

• Stable internet (minimum 50 Mbps download/upload on fiber connection)

• Backup internet (LTE mobile data or pocket Wi-Fi)

• Laptop or desktop with Intel i5 equivalent or higher, 8GB RAM

• Quality headset with noise-canceling microphone

• Functional webcam



What’s Next

1. Interested candidates should submit a face-to-camera, 2-minute introduction Loom video explaining why you’re the ideal fit for this role.

2. Attach your Loom URL, resume, and any relevant experience samples.

title: Wholesaling va
description:
Job Title: Real Estate Wholesaling Assistant (Cold Calling & Lead Generation)

Job Type:



Part-Time / Remote

Commission-Based Position



About the Role:



We are looking for a motivated and confident Real Estate Wholesaling Assistant to help generate off-market property leads through cold calling. This role is ideal for someone who speaks excellent English, communicates clearly, and is comfortable talking to property owners.



You will be the first point of contact with potential sellers and play a key role in helping secure real estate deals.



Responsibilities:



Make outbound cold calls to property owners using provided lists



Clearly communicate our interest in purchasing properties



Build rapport and handle objections professionally



Collect and document property details accurately



Set appointments or transfer qualified leads



Follow up with potential sellers when needed



Keep organized records of all conversations and call results



Requirements:



Strong spoken English (clear, confident, and professional)



Excellent communication and persuasion skills



Comfortable making high-volume cold calls



Positive mindset and resilience (ability to handle rejection)



Organized and detail-oriented



Previous experience in cold calling, sales, or real estate is a plus



Compensation:



This position is commission-based with $2.50 per hr.



You will earn 20% of the profit on every deal we close.



Example:

If a deal generates $15,000 in profit, you will earn $2,500–$3,000 (approximately 20%).



There is no cap on earnings — the more deals we close, the more you earn.

title: Shopify Web Developer - CRO Specialist - Ecommerce Advertising Agency - Full Time 5a

In this role you will update Shopify theme templates, develop landing pages using various page builders and html/CSS frameworks, research/install various checkout/bundle applications, and implement A/B tests using testing tools like intelligems.

You will also report on test performance, and provide suggestions for next steps.

This is a full-time opportunity. Training will be provided and you will work directly with me.

My name is Zack Miller, and I’ve been a DTC Ecommerce Growth Marketer since 2019. I’ve done everything fro
dia buying and client strategy, to agency internal operations.

I’ve contributed to the growth of over 200 ecommerce brands in my agency experience. Now, as an independent growth marketing partner, I work closely with a small number of brands on their new customer acquisition strategy.

title: WordPress Website Redesign & Overhaul Virtual Assistant
description:
About the Role & Project:

I'm Blaine Campbell – author of The Seventh Stone, creator of AI-generated cosmic art, automation architect, and advocate for radical authenticity ("Fix it or f*ck it" at 417Hz). My personal brand site (
) promotes my sci-fi book, gallery of cosmic/AI art, blog/content, comedy/media explorations, and future automation/creation services.

Right now, the site feels wonky, outdated, and disjointed – navigation is clunky, flow doesn't guide visitors smoothly from landing ? book/art discovery ? about/connect, mobile responsiveness could be better, and overall it lacks the polished, immersive, high-vibe energy that matches the themes of transformation, chaos-to-pattern, and raw truth.

I need a skilled VA to take full ownership of a complete redesign and overhaul. This is not just minor tweaks – it's a fresh structure, better user journey, modern aesthetics, and improved functionality to convert visitors into book buyers, art fans, newsletter subscribers, or future collaborators 

Audit the current site (likely WordPress-based) and propose a clear redesign plan: new sitemap, page flow, visual style guide aligned with "radical authenticity + 417Hz cosmic vibe" (dark mode options? immersive elements? subtle animations?).

Rebuild/restructure the site with clean, modern WordPress setup:

Intuitive navigation and hero sections that hook immediately (e.g., book promo + art teaser + tagline).

Smooth flow: Home ? The Seventh Stone (shop links, excerpts, experience) ? Cosmic Art Gallery (enhanced visuals, categories) ? About (deeper bio/story) ? Blog/Cosmic posts ? Connect 
 signup, contact form).



Improve mobile/desktop responsiveness and speed (optimize images, plugins, etc.).

Integrate or enhance key features: e-commerce/book purchase links (IngramSpark/Amazon),
 capture (e.g., Mailchimp or similar), gallery/portfolio display for AI art, basic SEO tweaks (meta, alt text, slugs).

Update content/copy where needed for better engagement (I can provide direction; you handle implementation).

Test thoroughly for bugs, broken links, and cross-browser compatibility.



Monthly maintenance, content updates (new blog posts, art additions, book promos).

Help with expansions: possible membership area, automation integrations (e.g., Zapier for workflows), or tying in future projects (comedy clips, media).

Collaborate creatively – suggest improvements, mood boards, or tools that fit the brand.



Required Skills & Experience:



Strong WordPress expertise (themes like Astra/GeneratePress + Elementor/Beaver Builder/Gutenberg; custom CSS/PHP if needed).

Proven experience redesigning/overhauling personal/portfolio/creative sites (portfolio or examples required – show before/after!).

Good eye for modern, artistic design – clean, immersive, dark/cosmic aesthetics preferred (not corporate/boring).

Solid understanding of user flow & UX – how to guide visitors emotionally and toward actions (buy book, view art, connect).

Basic graphic editing (Canva/Photoshop for resizing art, creating banners).

Reliable, proactive communicator – use Slack/Email/Loom for updates; weekly check-ins.

Bonus (not required but big plus): Experience with e-commerce plugins (WooCommerce),
 marketing tools, basic SEO, or AI/art-related sites.



What I'm Looking For in You:



High ID Proof and/or IQ Score (110+) preferred for trust and quick learning.

Creative mindset – you get "radical authenticity" and can bring bold ideas without overstepping.

Self-starter who can work independently but asks smart questions.

Long-term mindset – this could grow into a core role as my brand expands.



How to Apply:

Reply with:



Your hourly rate expectation.

Weekly availability (hours/time zone – I'm in Playa del Carmen, MX, so flexible overlap helpful).

Link to 2–3 relevant WordPress redesign examples (before/after screenshots or live sites).

A short note on why this project excites you (bonus if you mention the book's themes or 417Hz vibe!).

Your OnlineJobs.ph profile link.



Looking forward to finding the right person to help turn chaos into a killer digital blueprint. Let's fix it – or f*ck it. ????

title: Amazon Catalog and Account Health Specialist
description:
SuperOrdinary is a growing company seeking an exceptional individual to join our Account Health team. As an Account Health Specialist, you will play a vital role in supporting our Amazon Account Health team and ensuring the success of our FBA & FBM product listings on Amazon. We are looking for an Amazon-savvy, dependable, and passionate individual who enjoys learning new skills and is committed to delivering exceptional results.



Responsibilities and Duties:

• Execute routine product updates and launch new products, including content updates, product images, attributions, item data uploads, and category adjustments.

• Create new product listings on Amazon, adhering to the required guidelines and standards.

• Utilize Amazon Inventory flat files to efficiently make bulk listing updates across multiple listings and brands.

• Resolve account health policy violations to maintain a high level of account health.

• Excellent communication skills are essential to effectively articulate and describe issues to internal stakeholders and when opening support cases with Amazon's Seller Support and SAS assistance.

• Work with the Account Health team to analyze Amazon's product compliance requirements globally.

• Assist in responding to customer inquiries and messages, including weekends and some US holidays.

• Dispute negative feedback, monitor product reviews, and The Voice of the Customer dashboard.

• Utilize advanced Microsoft Excel skills to create micro/macro pivot tables, VLOOKUP, and Xlookup reports for the broader team.

• Monitor and resolve stranded and unsellable FBA inventory errors.



Qualifications:

• Excellent verbal and written English proficiency is essential.

• Detail-oriented individual with prior experience working in Seller Central US, CA & UK.

• Demonstrated experience resolving account health policy violations and maintaining account health.

• Proficiency in using Amazon Inventory flat files to make bulk listing updates.

• Strong analytical skills and ability to analyze Amazon's product compliance requirements.

• Excellent communication skills and ability to respond to customer inquiries and messages effectively.

• Familiarity with catalog audits and SKU performance reporting.

• Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel.

• High-quality completion with excellent time-management and multi-tasking skills.

• Ability to effectively support diverse projects in a fast-paced and demanding environment.

• Creative problem solver with a strong understanding of Amazon’s Seller Central.

• Positive attitude, professional communication, and effortless collaboration

• Demonstrates initiative and self-motivation.

• Highly organized with attention to detail and accuracy.

• Experience using a software platform such as Asana, Plytix & Slack



Working Hours:

• Work Week: Wednesday - Sunday

• Hours: 8:00 am – 5:00 pm CST



At SuperOrdinary, we are committed to providing the necessary training to set you up for success in this role. If you are a motivated individual who thrives in a fast-paced environment and is eager to contribute to our Account Health team, we encourage you to apply. Join us and be a part of our exciting journey in revolutionizing the e-commerce industry.

title: SMS Campaign Operator – Real Estate (Launch Leads)
description:
We are a fast-growing U.S. land acquisition company running high-volume SMS campaigns through Launch Leads.

We are hiring a full-time SMS Campaign Operator whose sole responsibility is managing live seller conversations and qualifying serious landowners before pushing them to our sales team. 



This is not a casual texting job. You will be the front-line filter of our acquisition engine. You directly report to and train with the VP of Sales.





What You’ll Be Doing:

- Managing live inbound SMS conversations inside Launch Leads

- Responding quickly (under 2–5 minutes depending on volume)

- Using structured scripts + smart improvisation

- Identifying serious seller intent

- Confirming interest through a qualification checklist

- Avoiding leads who may say "yes" but are not serious

- Pushing qualified leads directly to CRM (1-click push)

- Light tagging inside Launch Leads dashboard

- Maintaining clean conversation notes

**You will not be required to negotiate price or speak on the phone.





Performance Expectations:

We measure:

- Speed to response

- Low false positives (fake leads)

- Clean qualification standards

- Volume of legitimate qualified leads

**Quality > volume. If you push junk leads, our reps waste time.





Required Experience:

- Prior SMS/chat sales experience (required)

- Experience using Launch Leads or a similar SMS platform (strongly preferred)

- Comfortable working full-time 9am–5pm EST

- Strong written English (natural, American tone preferred)

- Ability to think on your feet in unpredictable conversations

**You must be able to follow scripts while also handling unexpected seller responses intelligently.



We do not want:

- Script-only robots

- Low initiative operators

- Poor written English

- Inconsistent attendance





Growth Opportunity

This role can grow into:

- SMS Team Lead

- Managing multiple SMS operators

- Campaign optimization oversight

**We promote based on performance and reliability.





Compensation

- $5–$9 per hour (based on experience with Launch Leads and real estate knowledge)

- Independent contractor

- Performance bonuses discussed individually

- Paid 1-month trial period





HOW TO APPLY: 

Keep this simple. When applying, include:

1. A short explanation of your experience with Launch Leads (or similar SMS platforms).

2. 2–3 example replies you would send to these seller messages:

- Example 1:

“Yeah maybe, depends on the price.”



- Example 2:

“How did you get my number?”



If you are experienced, fast, and understand qualification discipline, this role can grow quickly.

description:
All You Need Services, LLC is seeking a reliable and detail-oriented Project-Based Structural Designer to support residential and light commercial projects across Florida. This is a contract-based role ideal for professionals who can deliver accurate, permit-ready structural drawings aligned with Florida Building Code requirements.



The Structural Designer will collaborate with our Lead Designer, Professional Engineer, Designers and Project Managers to prepare complete structural plan sets ready for review, sign, and seal.



Key Responsibilities

• Prepare structural drawings and plan sets using AutoCAD and/or Revit for residential and light commercial projects.

• Develop foundation plans (monolithic slab, stem wall, etc.), framing layouts, and structural details based on engineer's calculations.

• Review boundary and topographic surveys to ensure proper structural placement.

• Assist in preparing permit-ready engineer plan packages for county submission.

• Implement revisions based on Professional Engineer and designers' markups and county comments.

• Support “After-the-Fact” and new construction projects as assigned.

• Maintain organized project files and version control within company systems.

• Perform basic quantity take-offs when required.



Required Qualifications

• Associate’s or Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering with proven experience in Structural Design

• Minimum 5 years of structural drafting/design experience (residential preferred).

• Strong proficiency in AutoCAD (Revit is a plus).

• Working knowledge of:

• Wood frame construction

• Concrete and CMU systems

• Florida residential construction practices

• Familiarity with the Florida Building Code (FBC) and local permitting processes.

• Ability to interpret structural calculations

• High attention to detail and strong organizational skills.

• Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.



Preferred Qualifications

• Experience with Lee County, Charlotte County, or similar Florida jurisdictions.

• Experience supporting permit submittals and responding to plan review comments.

• Familiarity with FEMA flood requirements and elevation coordination.

• Exposure to structural analysis software (ETABS, RAM, STAAD) is a plus.



Key Competencies

• Accuracy in permit drawings

• Strong coordination and communication

• Proactive problem-solving to avoid county rejections

• Time management in a fast-paced design environment

• Team collaboration with engineers and designers

title: Solutions Support Specialist (monday.com & Make.com)
description:
Role Overview





We manage systems, automations and business process for 24+ clients. We are seeking a Solutions Support Specialist who can act as the primary interface for client requests, provide training and support for our clients., and use AI tools to build a "living" knowledge base of our custom builds.



You will start with a 60-day trial period focusing on 1–2 key client accounts to demonstrate your ability to manage high-stakes communication, technical triage, and documentation before scaling to the full roster.





Key Responsibilities





Client Triage & SLA Management: Act as the first point of contact for all support queries. Categorize issues, provide clear ETAs, and ensure no request sits unacknowledged.



Direct Client Training: Conduct 1-on-1 or group training sessions via Zoom/Loom to teach clients how to use their specific monday.com setups effectively.



AI-Powered Documentation: Use AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Claude, or Scribe) to convert technical workflows into "living" SOPs. You will be responsible for maintaining a centralized knowledge database so that every custom automation is documented and searchable.



Technical Maintenance: Troubleshoot and repair Make.com scenario errors and monday.com logic gaps.



Knowledge Base Management: Update customer specific documentation and projects in real-time as systems evolve, ensuring the customers have an up to date knowledge base for their systems and software.





Requirements & Technical Proficiencies





Mastery of monday.com: Deep understanding of Formula columns, high-level Dashboards, and Workforms.



Make.com Logic: Ability to read JSON, map complex data structures, and handle error processing.



AI Tool Fluency: Experience using AI (LLMs) to summarize technical processes into user-friendly documentation. Google workspace proficiency is a bonus. Gmail, Drive, Gemini, Keep etc…



Educational Skills: Ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical business owners without using jargon.

The "Gatekeeper" 



Mindset: Obsessive about organization, task statuses, and meeting deadlines. Your goal is to save me as the lead architect time and focus. If you can successfully do that then we will be a successful partnership!

title: SEO Content & WordPress Growth Assistant (Luxury Construction – UK Market)
description:
COMPANY OVERVIEW



We are a high-end, architect-led construction company based in Cornwall, UK.



We build luxury coastal homes, passive houses, and high-performance residential projects.



We are building a large SEO authority platform targeting:



Luxury homes in Cornwall



Passive house construction



Timber frame builds



Coastal construction



Second-home clients from London and UK cities



We require a disciplined, detail-oriented SEO assistant to execute structured content and publishing systems.



ROLE OVERVIEW



You will execute SEO content production and publishing inside a structured system.



You are not responsible for strategy.

You are responsible for execution, accuracy, and consistency.



CORE RESPONSIBILITIES



• Publish long-form SEO pages (1,800–2,000+ words) in WordPress

• Format content correctly (H1, H2, H3 structure)

• Write meta titles and meta descriptions

• Add internal links correctly

• Optimise pages using RankMath or Yoast

• Upload and optimise images (alt text, compression)

• Follow content calendar

• Track published pages in spreadsheet

• Assist with backlink outreach
s

• Maintain consistent professional tone



REQUIRED SKILLS (NON-NEGOTIABLE)



• Strong written English (near-native level)

• WordPress publishing experience

• Understanding of SEO basics (H1, H2, internal links, keywords)

• Experience using SEO plugins (RankMath, Yoast or similar)

• Able to follow formatting rules strictly

• High attention to detail

• Comfortable working independently

• Able to meet deadlines without reminders



PREFERRED SKILLS



• Experience writing about construction, real estate, architecture, or property

• Experience with SurferSEO or similar tools

• Basic Canva or image editing ability

• Familiarity with Google Search Console

• Experience with backlink outreach



PERSONAL TRAITS REQUIRED



• Structured thinker

• Not overly salesy or promotional

• Comfortable receiving direct feedback

• Organised and methodical

• Long-term mindset



This role requires precision and consistency, not creativity or social media trends.



WHAT THIS ROLE IS NOT



• Not a social media manager role

• Not a graphic design role

• Not a marketing strategist role

• Not a short-term freelance job



APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS



To apply, please submit:



A sample SEO article you have written



A 600-word sample page titled:

“Luxury Home Builder in Rock, Cornwall”

Include:

• 1 meta title

• 1 meta description

• Proper H2 structure

• 3 internal link placeholders



Your weekly availability



Confirmation you can work full-time



Applications without the test task will not be considered.



PERFORMANCE REVIEW STRUCTURE



We review monthly based on:



• Pages published

• Formatting accuracy

• Grammar quality

• Internal linking accuracy

• Consistency



High performers receive long-term stability and potential salary increases.

title: Merchandise Operations Coordinator
description:
About COLOURS, LLC



COLOURS, LLC is a Merchandise & Creative Agency specializing in full-package merchandise programs, including product development, sourcing, production management, logistics coordination, and D2C & retail fulfillment.



We work with brands, artists, retailers, and touring clients to bring products from concept ? production ? fulfillment ? delivery across e-commerce, wholesale, and retail environments.



We are looking for a highly organized Merchandise Operations Coordinator to support daily order execution, warehouse coordination, and operational workflow management across multiple active programs.



Role Overview



This role sits at the center of COLOURS’ operations workflow.



You will manage incoming orders, coordinate fulfillment with warehouses, track shipments, maintain operational documents, and ensure orders move efficiently from confirmation to delivery.



This position requires strong attention to detail, comfort working with spreadsheets, and the ability to manage multiple moving projects simultaneously.



Core Responsibilities

Order & Operations Management



Monitor incoming orders from clients, web stores, and internal teams



Review orders for accuracy (SKUs, quantities, ship methods, addresses)



Create fulfillment requests and delivery orders for warehouse partners



Maintain accurate order tracking across internal spreadsheets and systems



Ensure orders move correctly through fulfillment pipelines



Warehouse & Logistics Coordination



Communicate daily with warehouse teams regarding fulfillment status



Track outbound shipments and coordinate with freight or trucking partners



Resolve shipment issues, shortages, or fulfillment discrepancies



Confirm shipment completion and delivery timelines



Client & Internal Communication



Provide shipment tracking and order updates to clients



Coordinate with production, logistics, and account teams internally



Escalate operational issues proactively before delays occur



Maintain professional written communication with partners and customers



Administrative & Data Management



Generate invoices and supporting order documentation



Maintain clean and organized order records



Update tracking dashboards and fulfillment sheets



Support reporting and operational organization



Required Skills



Excellent written and spoken English



Strong proficiency in Excel or Google Sheets



Extremely detail-oriented with strong organizational habits



Ability to manage high order volume and shifting priorities



Comfortable working in fast-paced production environments



Self-starter who can work independently with minimal supervision



Reliable laptop and stable internet connection



Availability during West Coast U.S. working hours



Preferred Experience



Apparel, merchandise, or promotional product industry experience



Production coordination or order management background



Experience working with warehouses or fulfillment partners



Familiarity with shipping platforms (ShipStation, UPS, FedEx, etc.)



Experience supporting D2C, retail, or wholesale programs



Agency or multi-client environment experience



What Success Looks Like at COLOURS



Orders are executed accurately without follow-up corrections



Warehouse partners receive clear, actionable instructions



Clients receive proactive updates instead of asking for status



Operational documents remain organized and up to date



Production and fulfillment timelines stay on track



Ideal Candidate Profile



You thrive in structured operational environments and enjoy keeping complex workflows organized. You are comfortable managing details, solving problems independently, and ensuring projects move forward without bottlenecks.



Application Requirements



Please submit:



Resume



Short introduction describing relevant operations or logistics experience



Confirmation of availability during West Coast U.S. hours

title: B2B LinkedIn & Blog Content Strategist for Manufacturing Authority Brand
description:
We are building a premium authority brand in the manufacturing industry focused on decision quality, Excel, Minitab, statistical thinking, and structured problem solving.



We are looking for a B2B content strategist and writer who can research, structure, and draft high quality LinkedIn posts and long form blog content for manufacturing leaders.



This is not cold outreach or appointment setting.



This role requires structured thinking, analytical writing, and the ability to simplify complex technical ideas without sounding promotional or generic.



Responsibilities:



1. Research high performing content across LinkedIn, YouTube, industry blogs, and manufacturing communities.

2. Analyze why certain content performs well.

3. Propose weekly content ideas aligned with authority positioning.

4. Draft 3 LinkedIn posts per week.

5. Draft 1 long form SEO focused blog article per month.

6. Maintain a calm, professional, executive level tone.

7. Use AI tools intelligently while ensuring originality and depth.



Ideal Candidate:



- Strong English writing skills.

- Experience writing for B2B or professional audiences.

- Comfortable explaining technical or analytical concepts clearly.

- Able to research independently and think critically.

- Proactive and structured.

- Able to manage content for two professional voices under one brand.



To Apply:



Please include:



1. Three LinkedIn posts you have written that explain complex professional topics.

2. A short explanation of your research process when writing in a new technical industry.

3. A 2 to 3 minute Loom video explaining how you would build authority in a manufacturing focused B2B niche.

4. Write a LinkedIn post (maximum 300 words) for manufacturing leaders on the topic:



“Why many manufacturing teams collect data but still make poor decisions.”



Create your own title.



5. Describe how you use AI tools in your writing process and how you ensure originality and depth.



Applications without these requirements will not be reviewed.

title: Remote Lawyer (3–6 Years Exp) – Migration & HR Support
description:
Remote Lawyer (3–6 Years Exp) – Migration & HR Support

Company: Cornerstone Migration Australia

Location: 100% Remote (Philippines-based)

Engagement: Independent Contractor (B2B / Service-based)

Compensation: $1,500 – $2,000 AUD per month 

Bonus: Performance-based incentives for lodgements and accuracy.



About the Firm

Cornerstone Migration is a premier Australian migration and HR consultancy led by a Registered Migration Agent with 19 years of experience (11 years in Australia). We handle complex employer-sponsored visas, compliance, and workforce strategy. We are fast-paced, high-standard, and results-driven.



The Role

We are not looking for a litigator. We are looking for a documentation specialist—a Philippine-qualified lawyer who is exceptionally fast, structured, and precise. You will be the engine room of our case preparation.



Your primary tasks will include:



Drafting high-level visa submissions and legal representations.



Preparing and reviewing complex contracts, agreements, and corporate HR documents.



Organizing and auditing supporting evidence for visa cases to ensure 100% compliance.



Conducting targeted legal research (Australian Migration and HR context).



Managing structured workflows to ensure rapid turnaround times.



Requirements

Experience: 3 to 6 years of post-qualification experience (PQE).



Credentials: Philippine Bar passer (mandatory).



Drafting Skills: Elite written English. You must be able to write logically, persuasively, and professionally.



Efficiency: High output capacity. You must be "quick" without sacrificing quality.



Technical: Advanced Microsoft Word formatting skills (essential for our professional standards).



Setup: Reliable fiber internet connection and a dedicated quiet workspace.



Schedule: Must be available during Australian business hours (Brisbane time).



Contractual Terms

Independent Contractor: This is a service-based engagement, not an employment contract.



Flat Fee: The monthly fee is all-inclusive ($1,800 – $2,500 AUD). There is no 13th-month pay, paid leave, or government contributions provided.



Performance Bonuses: We reward excellence. Bonuses are available based on accuracy, volume of lodgements, and successful outcomes.



How to Apply

To apply, please provide:



Updated CV.



Proof of Bar Admission.



A Writing Sample: A formal legal letter or a structured submission you have drafted.



Intro Video: A 1-minute video introducing yourself and explaining why you excel at documentation-heavy work.

description:
Job Title: Master Case Study & Story Editor (Freelance) - Guetta Studios 

Location: Remote 



At Guetta Studios, we’re aiming for emotional, documentary-style narrative on Case Studies. We are seeking a Story Editor who can take raw interviews, B-roll, and screen captures and weave them into a cinematic success story for clients like Google and Amazon. You are the invisible hand that guides the viewer's emotions, using sophisticated pacing, flawless audio mixing, and premium transitions.





What We Require

"Saatchi-level" narrative instincts. You know how to build a story arc, find the "hero moment" in an interview, and craft a compelling conclusion.

A highly sophisticated eye for B-roll selection and placement.

Flawless execution of clean, corporate typography and "Google-style" minimalism.

Seamless integration into our ClickUp and Frame.io workflow.

Exceptional English proficiency, high-speed internet, and the ability to handle constructive feedback like a pro.

Application Process

Portfolio Audit: Submit your best case studies or documentary-style commercial work. Do not submit wedding videos, vlogs, or gaming edits.

The Micro-Trial: If selected, you will be assigned a paid, tightly-deadlined edit test using a segment of a real, past Guetta Studios project.





To Apply: 

Send your portfolio link showcasing narrative/case study work, your standard rate, and your time zone.

title: Customer Service / Appointment Setter
description:
We are a private ultrasound healthcare clinic, specialising in both pregnancy scans and diagnostic medical ultrasound scans. We are looking to employ an assistant with excellent customer service skills and somebody who is willing to learn the business by studying the types of scans and helping customers with their questions and appointment setting, and managing customer
s.



The number of phone calls can vary from just 2-3 a day on quiet days to 20 a day on busier days, it really does vary.

Therefore, it is essential we work with somebody who is willing to work flexibly as the business continues to grow. Once we are busy enough, we will move the role to a full-time role. Calls tend to take place any time between 8am-5pm (UK time) however, the initial weekly requirements will be as follows:



Mon 8am-10am

Tue 8am-10am, and 3pm-5pm

Wed 8am-12pm

Thu 8am-5pm

Fri 8am-4pm



We are very much looking forward to building a long-term relationship with the right person and welcoming them into the team of our privately run, family clinic!

title: Reddit Assistant
description:
We’re hiring people to manage daily activity on Reddit, including posting content and interacting within communities. This is ongoing work and requires someone who actually understands how Reddit functions, not just how to scroll it.



You’ll need atleast 3+ devices (Android only). If you own multiple devices, that’s a plus and allows you to earn more. Expect roughly one hour of work per device each day.



Each day you’ll post content across several subreddits.



A critical part of this role is reading the room. The videos we provide can range from humorous to emotional to awkward or uncomfortable. You need to instantly recognize the tone and write posts that feel natural for that type of content. If you post everything the same way, you’ll fail.



You’ll also be responsible for finding appropriate subreddits for each video. That means reviewing community rules, understanding what performs well there, and making sure your post doesn’t look forced or out of place. If you can’t do that consistently, this position isn’t for you.



We’re looking for people who think independently, adapt fast, and don’t need their hand held. Prior Reddit experience is helpful but not mandatory if you learn quickly.



This is a long-term opportunity for dependable workers. Compensation is solid and can increase based on results and how many devices you use.



Earnings:

Most contributors earn $100–$500 per month, depending on consistency and the number of devices used.



Time Commitment:

Daily time commitment ranges from about 1 to 5 hours, depending on how many devices you’re using



To apply, include:

• how many devices you can work with

• your experience using Reddit

• when you’re available each day

title: Fulltime Experienced Funnel Builder -Funnelish

title: Dropshipping Product Research Assistant
description:
Dropshipping Product Research Assistant



(Remote | Performance-Focused | Vendor Sourcing)



We are hiring a data-driven Product Research Assistant to identify high-performing dropshipping products and work directly with suppliers to validate viability before launch.



This is not random product scraping.

We are looking for someone who can source, score, and validate real winners.



---



### Core Responsibilities



* Identify trending and scalable dropshipping products

* Research competitors across Meta, TikTok, Amazon, and Shopify stores

* Analyze ad libraries and product engagement metrics

* Work directly with vendors to:



  * Confirm pricing tiers

  * Negotiate MOQs

  * Validate shipping times

  * Confirm inventory stability

* Score products based on:



  * Margin potential

  * AOV opportunity

  * Creative angle strength

  * Market saturation

  * Repeat purchase potential

* Build organized research sheets with:



  * Supplier info

  * Cost breakdown

  * Estimated CAC targets

  * Competitive landscape

* Present top 5–10 qualified products weekly for review



---



### Ideal Candidate



* Experience in dropshipping product research (1+ years preferred)

* Comfortable analyzing TikTok Creative Center / Meta Ad Library

* Understands margin math and contribution margin

* Knows how to evaluate product-market fit

* Has experience sourcing from AliExpress, Alibaba, CJ, private suppliers, etc.

* Organized, analytical, and proactive

* Strong written English for vendor communication



---



### What We Care About



We are not looking for:



* Random trending TikTok products

* Oversaturated junk

* Copy-paste AliExpress lists



We want:



* Data-backed opportunities

* Scalable margins (30%+ net potential)

* Creative-first products that can scale with paid traffic



---



### Deliverables



* Weekly product shortlist (5–10 validated products)

* Full cost breakdown + supplier contact

* Competitive ad examples

* Clear reasoning for why the product can win



---



### Compensation



* Base monthly pay (to be discussed)

* Performance bonus per product launched

* Additional bonuses for products that scale

title: Senior n8n + Supabase + Lovable/Base44 Automation Expert – Remote
description:
Seeking expert-level n8n specialist (3+ yrs heavy production use) for complex, scalable automations with Lovable/Base44 and Supabase backends. No juniors, no "learning n8n".



Non-Negotiable Requirements:

-3+ years building advanced n8n workflows: multi-branch logic, error handling, custom JS/TS code nodes, heavy API orchestration, webhooks, looping, scheduling, AI nodes.



-Proven n8n + Lovable/Base44 integrations: AI-driven code tools, frameworks for automation/backend, custom integrations. Must show real examples. (Zapier/Windmill experience a plus, but n8n core.)



-Strong PostgreSQL/SQL: complex queries (JOINs, CTEs, window functions), optimization, schema design.



-Hands-on Supabase experience: auth (RLS, JWT), tables/schemas, Edge Functions, Realtime, Storage, full backend APIs + n8n webhooks.



-JavaScript/TypeScript proficiency for custom nodes/functions.



Strong Plus: Agency/SaaS automations, Make/Zapier fallback, Stripe/Whop/Airtable, basic frontend (Tailwind/Next.js).

Apply ONLY if you meet ALL above and send a demo – others ignored. Only applicants who provide demos will be considered.



: 

Subject: n8n Supabase Lovable/Base44 Expert – [Your Name] + and a ????



Include:

1. Resume/portfolio.

2. GitHub profile link (pinned repos with relevant n8n/custom code strongly preferred).

3. 2-3 specific examples: n8n + Lovable/Base44 workflow JSON/screenshots/Loom video (complex ones only). Send as demo attachments/links.

4. Brief: One complex n8n + Lovable/Base44 workflow you built (describe outcome, explain the process simply so a non-technical person can follow). 



Serious experts only. If you routinely solve "impossible" integrations, apply now.

Our goal:



Reduce TACOS to 15% within 120 days.

This is a profit recovery role — not a scaling role.



Your Role (6 Hours per Week)

70% – PPC Optimization



• Analyze search term reports

• Remove waste keywords

• Add negative keywords weekly

• Lower high ACOS bids

• Reduce broad match dependency

• Focus on exact match profitability

• Reallocate budget to winning terms

• Weekly short performance report



30% – Amazon Account Support



• Monitor conversion rate

• Check listing health

• Track competitors

• Monitor refund rate

• Create coupons if needed

• Basic Seller Central tasks

• Flag problems and suggest improvements



No design work.

No external marketing.

No scaling experiments.



Performance Goal



Reduce TACOS from 30% to 15% within 120 days.



Sales may decrease slightly.

Profitability is the priority.



IMPORTANT – Read Carefully

To be considered:

1 Start your application with the word PROFIT

2 Answer all questions clearly.

3 Attach a screenshot of a real Amazon PPC dashboard.

4 Include a 2-minute Loom explaining how you would reduce TACOS from 30% to 15%.



Applications without this will not be reviewed.



Required Questions

1 If break-even TACOS is 23% and actual TACOS is 30%, are we profitable? Why?

2 If margin before ads is 23%, what is the maximum safe TACOS?

3 In an Auto campaign, what exact steps would you take to reduce waste spend?

4 A keyword has 25 clicks and 0 sales. What do you do?

5 What are the first 3 reports you check in Seller Central when entering a new account?

6 What Amazon Seller Central tasks (outside PPC) have you handled before?



Only experienced Amazon PPC specialists should apply.

title: YouTube Video/Thumbnail Editor [One Spot Left]
description:
We are two Filipino Entrepreneurs looking for a creative video editor for our YouTube Media Marketing Company (Real Estate Niche). The culture that we've built within our team can not be found anywhere else and it's kind of like a family. We are all Filipino and can understand Tagalog and Bisaya but prefer English. 



*WE ARE NOT HIRING AGENCIES*



Our company's name is WG Media, and our website is 
dia 



In one year's time, we managed to get 600k+ Video views, and 4,000 subscribers with hundreds of videos on our personal channel. 



On your application, please state what makes you stand out from everybody else. We've scanned through hundreds of applicants and those that we've hired so far didn't just copy and paste their applications. Stand out from the crowd by providing something unique about yourself :)



*PLEASE SEND PROOF OF VIDEOS MADE. ANY APPLICATION WITHOUT PROOF WILL BE AUTOMATICALLY DISMISSED*



You will be required to edit 3 - 5 videos every week, including thumbnails. Our Head of media will provide you with video templates to make things easier. You will need to cut both audio and video while adding b-roll content.



You must be proficient in Video Editing & Photoshop. 



WE ARE LOOKING FOR SOMEONE LONG TERM (AT LEAST 1-5 YEARS ), So if you are looking for stability and a place where you can work and truly build a career, then this is the place for you. On top of editing videos/photos, we are very into self-development, so you will be required to read one book a month. We give a PDF of this book so you can read it along with the rest of the team. 



Also, you will be required to attend 1-2 meetings a week via
 where you will also meet the rest of the team (who are also located in the Philippines)



We need you to have experience editing videos for this position and WOULD LIKE TO SEE PROOF OF VIDEOS THAT YOU'VE ALREADY MADE. We have MASSIVE goals for our company and have been doing YouTube for many years, so if you have YouTube experience then please state that in the description. If you have experience doing YOUTUBE VIDEO EDITING, we will prioritize your application over every else's.



We're looking for somebody who is teachable and can work very fast, so if you are a quick learner and can perform the tasks that we ask, you will be compensated very well. What are you waiting for? APPLY NOW because interviews get booked and we hire FAST (Usually within 2-4 days) There is HUGE upside potential. The salary stated in the application is only STARTING SALARY. You have the potential to make as much as you want if you can provide great value.



IF YOU CAN'T DO A
 VIDEO INTERVIEW THEN DO NOT APPLY, WE HAVE GOTTEN MANY APPLICANTS AND ARE VERY PICKY WITH WHO WE WILL HIRE SO PLEASE BE READY.

title: Founding Head of Digital Creative (Digital Growth & AI Creative Lead)
description:
AI DRIVEN Founding Digital Creative Lead for a music start-up group



We’re building something ambitious: a tech-powered music movement driven by AI, storytelling, and bold creative execution.

Right now, we need one person to take ownership of it _ no excuses, just action and responsibility-centered attitude 



This isn’t a “social media poster” role. It’s a command position. You will architect our entire digital presence for two primary music bands across YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, X 
), and
 (main + fan pages). You’ll design the strategy, build the systems, and execute at a level that proves you’re capable of eventually leading a full creative department.



In the beginning, you’ll be hands-on. You’ll build the engine (processes, schedules, flow, etc). And as we scale, you’ll build and lead the team.



This is a long-term opportunity for someone who wants to grow with a company that sees them as a trusted future Head of Digital Creative -but for now, you’ll need to demonstrate that you can own performance, innovation, and results.



The Mission

You will take full control of our digital growth, creative direction, and performance strategy using the latest AI tools available. Every post, short, reel, long-video, visual, and AI-generated asset will run through your creative leadership. Your success will be measured by engagement, growth, consistency, and creative impact.



What You’ll Own:

- Creative Direction & Strategy (with our input / ideas of course) – Build and execute a cohesive AI-powered content vision across all platforms (short-form, long-form, visuals, audio, lip-sync, experimental formats).

- Multi-Platform Growth Leadership – Design and manage structured 30-day content calendars optimized for each platform’s algorithm, target audience and culture.

- AI Content Production – Use advanced generative tools (video, image, audio, LLMs, prompt engineering) to create high-output, high-quality content efficiently.

- Performance Optimization – Analyze weekly data, identify viral hooks, test variations, and refine strategy based on measurable results.

- Brand Voice & Systems – Develop prompt frameworks and AI workflows that maintain consistent tone, aesthetic, and storytelling across platforms.

- Community & Engagement Management – Implement AI-assisted systems to maintain strong audience interaction, including comments and DMs.

- Able to benchmark market trends, anticipate future trends based on our input, revelation of Company direction to stay ahead of the rest.

- Future Team Leadership – As growth accelerates, prepare to recruit, train, and manage editors, designers, and VAs under your direction.



Who You Are

- First, you're a good, trustworthy and dependable person of character who understands that work is responsibility & service first.

- Experienced in creative direction, content strategy, and hands-on social media growth.

- Highly AI-literate i.e, comfortable using LLMs, generative video tools, AI design platforms, and automation systems (we will test your practical ability).

- Deeply knowledgeable about YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Shorts, Reels, and emerging platform trends — including how virality and engagement actually works (or ready and able to learn really fast).

- Capable of turning raw concepts into structured campaigns with clear performance goals.

- Exceptionally organized, efficient, and performance-driven.

- Strong communicator with excellent written and verbal English.

- Energized, thrilled by creativity, experimentation -you love building, testing, iterating, and refining.

- Ready for creative autonomy (and very comfortable asking for help, advice, clarification, ideas, second opinion etc) -and accountable for results.



The Opportunity:

- Fully remote.

- Full-time preferred (part-time possible if transitioning quickly to full-time).

- Competitive compensation based on capability and results.

- Long-term, stable growth path.

- Clear trajectory toward leading your own department as the company expands.

- Immediate start.



Final Note: This role is for someone who wants more than a job.

If you want to prove yourself, build something from the ground up, and grow into a leadership position inside a forward-thinking music company, -this is your moment.

title: Marketing Operations Manager | Sprint Planning | ClickUp Advanced | Agency
description:
EEMS is a Caribbean-based marketing and PR agency serving high-value clients across professional services, tourism, and compliance sectors. We run a lean team of three plus subcontractors, and we operate across a wide range of services including social media management, digital advertising,
 marketing, campaign management, brand development, events, and PR.



We are looking for an experienced marketing operations professional to own sprint planning and team coordination starting March 15, 2026.



This is a project-based contract for March with the intention of expanding to an ongoing fractional arrangement from April if it goes well.





WHAT YOU WILL OWN



- Plan and publish the weekly team sprint in ClickUp every week

- Break all projects into granular subtasks with step-by-step execution instructions

- Coordinate two direct team members (graphic designer and digital marketing specialist) plus subcontractors

- Manage mid-week reprioritization independently without CEO involvement in routine decisions

- Track sprint performance using our existing dashboard tracker

- Audit our current ClickUp structure and implement improvements

- Flag blocked items early with proposed resolutions

- Identify workflow gaps and build systems that make the team more efficient





THIS IS NOT THE RIGHT FIT IF YOU



- Need to be told what to prioritize

- Use ClickUp as a checklist tool rather than a full project management system

- Have not managed a team sprint in ClickUp before

- Need frequent check-ins or direction to stay productive

- Prefer large, structured corporate environments





WHAT WE NEED FROM YOU



- Minimum 3 years in a marketing operations, project management, or agency operations role

- Advanced ClickUp experience including sprint management, custom fields, automations, dashboards, and workflow design

- Proven ability to coordinate a team and keep projects moving toward deadlines independently

- Strong written English

- Available to overlap with Caribbean timezone (AST, 9am to 5pm) on weekdays







ENGAGEMENT DETAILS



- Start date: March 15, 2026

- Duration: 4 weeks project contract, with fractional expansion from April based on performance

- Budget: $500 USD fixed price for March

- Hours: 40 to 50 hours across the month

- Location: Remote

title: Data Entry and CRM Manager (US Tax Preparation) experienced with TaxSlayer

-

-Works closely with Executive Assistant and Due Diligence Specialist



QUALIFICATIONS:

-High attention to detail and strong organizational skills

-Excellent written communication skills

WE'RE LOOKING FOR:

-A professional seeking long-term stability, not a short-term role

-Strong follow-through and accountability



We are investing in the right person and are looking for someone who wants to grow with us, not someone looking for a temporary position.



If you have solid U.S. tax preparation experience, and are looking for a stable opportunity with a supportive team, we would love to hear from you.

title: Amazon Virtual Assistant (Online Arbitrage & Store Management)
description:

title: TikTok Talent & Creator Recruiter
description:
We are a growing TikTok Creator Network seeking a recruiter based in the Philippines to help us identify, attract, and onboard high quality Filipino creators who desire to become trained and skilled Live Hosts into our agency.



This role is responsible for sourcing creators, initiating conversations, screening applicants, and guiding qualified creators into our onboarding process.



We are looking for someone who understands TikTok culture, communicates clearly, and can identify creators with strong potential, consistency, and professionalism.



This is not a passive admin role. This is a proactive recruiting position focused on growth.



Key Responsibilities



Creator Sourcing

• Identify potential TikTok creators across niches

• Search TikTok manually and through platform tools

• Engage creators via DMs and
 outreach

• Build and maintain a running list of prospects



Outreach and Relationship Building

• Send structured outreach messages

• Follow up with interested creators

• Answer basic agency questions

• Build trust and rapport



Screening and Qualification

• Review creator content quality and consistency

• Evaluate engagement rates and growth potential

• Assess brand alignment and professionalism

• Pre qualify creators before passing them to the agency



Tracking and Reporting

• Maintain a weekly recruitment tracker

• Report outreach volume and conversion rates

• Track signed creators and pipeline status



Onboarding Support

• Guide approved creators through the onboarding process

• Ensure required documents are submitted

• Coordinate with agency leadership as needed



Performance Expectations



• Outreach to a minimum number of creators per week

• Maintain organized tracking system

• Meet monthly signed creator targets

• Maintain professional communication standards



KPIs may include:

• Outreach volume

• Response rate

• Qualified creator rate

• Signed creator rate

•  6 month retention of recruited creators



Qualifications



Required

• Based in the Philippines

• Strong understanding of TikTok culture and trends

• Clear written and spoken English

• Experience with outreach, recruiting, or sales

• Organized and self managed



Preferred

• Experience working with influencers or creator agencies

• Familiarity with TikTok Creator Culture

• Experience using spreadsheets or CRM tools

• Background in social media management



Ideal Candidate Profile



You understand how TikTok works beyond scrolling.

You can identify creators who are consistent and serious.

You are comfortable sending outreach messages daily.

You are not discouraged by non responses.

You take initiative and follow through.



Compensation



Commission per ACTIVE creator



Details will be discussed during the interview process.



Growth Opportunity



As the agency expands, this role may grow into:

• Lead Recruiter

• Creator Talent Manager

• Regional Recruitment Manager



How to Apply



Interested candidates should submit:

• Resume

• Short paragraph explaining their experience with TikTok

• Example of how they would approach recruiting a creator

• Screenshot of a TikTok account they believe has strong potential and why
